V社 nb

Short and sweet, but very interesting if you're looking for some insight as to how games are visually polished. Considering the graphics of Half Life 2 still hold up to the present day, its fun to know how they did it (specifically in lighting, in the case of this game) to optimize it. You'll spend a good half hour at best playing it, but its worth the interesting commentary.
Красивая фигня

Half-Life 2: Lost Coast é uma tech-demo que acompanha a compra de Half-Life 2 na Steam. Não há muito o que falar, visto que é só uma demo introduzindo os jogadores às mecânicas de Half-Life 2 e da Source Engine. É uma experiência rápida de nem uma hora, mas sólida.
Mauvais jeu.

Half life Lost coast é uma tech demo para o HDR usando uma parte descartada da campanha de hl2. O jogo é bem curto da pra zerar em uns 10 minutos o tiroteio é bom nessa demo e os gráficos são incríveis até pros padrões atuais, a demo n tem muito valor replay mas eu de vez enquando jogo essa demo só para ter um tiroteio rápido
Short game but hearing gaben speak is always relaxing 10/10

Una demostración de las características del motor Source, es mucho mejor jugarlo con los comentarios de los desarrolladores porque te explican los detalles y las características que se aplicaron al HL 2 (todo lo relativo a paisajes, brillo, color, iluminación, diseño de los personajes, diseño de los edificios, etc), también te cuentan algunas cosas que se suprimieron del juego (aspectos que originalmente pensaban añadir pero que luego desecharon).
Игра нормальная ну ток если тренировать стрельбу и логику. К разработчикам : Вода у вас не везде дамажит, а игруха иногда подлагивает
虽然流程短，不过我还是很喜欢

Il n'y a pas grand chose (et grand intérêt) à jouer à Lost Coast.
En revanche je vous y invite si le behind the scene de Half-Life vous intéresse, vous êtes guidé dans le fonctionnement de plusieurs point important de Half-Life, notamment les combats, énigme et environnement, etc ... proposé par le Jeux original. 
Pour ça, pensez à activer les Sous-Titres des développeurs.

Lost Coast prouve à quel point la VALVe company était dans le FUTUR en 2004.
Fajna gierka, bardzo :-)
Engaging mix of FPS and puzzles.
A really short but still fun behind the scenes game about Half Life 2.

Pequeño gameplay con interacciones para mostrar todo el poder del HDR a la comunidad.

Игра-демка для показа всех возможностей нового движка. Приятно и интересно было почитать комментарии разработчиков. Если вам через 20 минут пора на работу, то вполне можно успеть пройти игру.

This was a cool experience to kind of see where technology was back in 2005 and where it was going. It is very short but its not there for the gameplay its there for the experience and to showcase just what valve was working on back then. Looking at today's games in 2020 with VR and all that, it doesn't look like much but back then it was a big deal in the gaming industry

9/10
